question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. traffic light
B. umbrella
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The traffic light is mounted on a pole in the foreground and occupies a large portion of the frame, while the umbrella is held by a person further back, clearly indicating the traffic light is closer to the camera.
